instruction: Generate an interesting quest for a role-playing game.
output: The player must break a centuries-old curse that has turned an enchanted forest into a dark and dangerous place. To do so, the player must travel to the center of the forest and locate the source of the curse. Along the way, they will face powerful enemies, solve tricky puzzles, and navigate many obstacles. Once the player has succeeded, they will be rewarded with a magical treasure.
